parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the state of the score table set with [[showScoretable]] command. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Since Arma 3 v1.63.137869, the previous functionality of this command (score table visibility check) is moved to [[visibleScoretable]] command. Please update your scripts and sorry for any inconvinience.</value></part></template>
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[shownScoretable]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - 0: Force hidden, 1: Force shown, -1: Default
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <code>_state = [[shownScoretable]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showScoretable]], [[visibleScoretable]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
</dl>
